CustomField.formula: Mailing_Address_Arabic__c & IF(ISBLANK(Mailing_Address_Arabic__c), "",",") & TEXT( Mailing_City_Arabic__c ) & IF(ISPICKVAL(Mailing_City_Arabic__c,""), "", ",") & TEXT( Mailing_State_Arabic__c ) & IF(ISPICKVAL(Mailing_State_Arabic__c, ""), "", ",") & TEXT( Mailing_Country_Arabic__c )
CustomField.label: Complete Arabic Address
